channel.title: netbeans Tutorial on
channel.description: Recent content in netbeans Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with netbeans
item.description: Run Your Java Program with Netbeans IDE # So, you have completed installation it’s time now to Run you program with it. Netbeans has created a shortcut to your desktop, “Double click” that to open the IDE. To Create a new project 1. Click this button OR Goto: files » New Project then this window will popup Select Java from categories (from the left side) And Java Application from projects (form the right side) as indicated in the image above.

item.title: Shortcuts
item.description: Code Editor Shortcuts # Generate code # Alt+Insert Add comment lines # Ctrl+Shift+C Remove comment lines # Ctrl+/ Format selection # Alt+Shift+F Fix all class imports # Ctrl-Shift-I Fix selected class’s import # Alt+Shift+I Shift lines left # Alt+Shift+← Shift lines right # Alt+Shift+→ Shift lines up # Alt+Shift+↑ Shift lines down # Alt+Shift+↓ Toggle Rectangular Selection # Ctrl+Shift+R Copy lines up # Ctrl+Shift+↑ Copy lines down # Ctrl+Shift+↓ Delete current line # Ctrl+E
